div.div: Buying and selling people into forced labor is bigger than ever. Here's what "human trafficking" really means.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XJcAzQ&via=Digg&text=Slavery's Global Comeback

div.a: Man Walks Into Different Sandy Hook Elementary With Wooden 'High Powered Rifle'

div.div: It remains unclear why a Virginia man walked into the Sandy Hook Elementary School in Strasburg this morning armed with a 2 x 4 labeled "High Powered Rifle," though the Shenandoah County Sheriff's Office believes he was trying to make a point about school security — or, rather, lack thereof.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T8syVx&via=Digg&text=Man Walks Into Different Sandy Hook Elementary With Wooden 'High Powered Rifle'

div.a: Getting To Know The Navy's New Stealth Drone

div.div: The U.S. Navy's X-47B is preparing for its first carrier launch. Get to know the newest drone in the American arsenal.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T7aFpZ&via=Digg&text=Getting To Know The Navy's New Stealth Drone
https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQqn60&via=Digg&text=The 25 Funniest AutoCorrects Of 2012

div.div: Do you know why snowflakes form into such beautiful shapes? Let the American Chemical Society explain things to you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SNpi3M&via=Digg&text=The Chemistry Of Snowflakes

div.a: Democratic Senators Push To Make 'New Columbia' Nation's 51st State

div.div: Senators Joe Lieberman, Dick Durbin, Patty Murray, and Barbara Boxer introduced legislation Wednesday to grant Washington, D.C. statehood, creating the nation's 51st state — "New Columbia."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WpZhVH&via=Digg&text=Democratic Senators Push To Make 'New Columbia' Nation's 51st State

div.div: Hold on a second. Emilio Estevez is 5 foot 4? This changes EVERYTHING. nextmovie.com/blog/shortes...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uagbcn&via=Digg&text=The Hollywood Height Chart

div.a: How To Create A Matrix Bullet Time-Style Rig With 50 DSLRs

div.div: Martin Leeger managed to build a rig that can capture a 360 degree image using 50 DSLRs in a client's villa.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V84vCk&via=Digg&text=How To Create A Matrix Bullet Time-Style Rig With 50 DSLRs

div.a: Portraits Of Gun Owners In Their Homes

div.div: In 2007, Kyle Cassidy published a book called "Armed America: Portraits of Gun Owners in Their Homes." He asked his subjects a simple question: Why do you own a gun?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SMTZ9q&via=Digg&text=Portraits Of Gun Owners In Their Homes

div.a: Mount Everest, In Two Billion Pixels

div.div: You may have already seen thousands of photographs of Mt. Everest, but you've never seen it like this.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U965aN&via=Digg&text=Mount Everest, In Two Billion Pixels

div.a: Argument About Sandy Hook Shooting Ends In A Shooting

div.div: A man has been arrested after allegedly becoming agitated during a barber shop discussion of the Sandy Hook School shooting and shooting at another patron.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R5tmL4&via=Digg&text=Argument About Sandy Hook Shooting Ends In A Shooting

div.div: LIKE GRABBING BAGS OF SAND, RIGHT?
Scientists found that applying physical pressure to malignant breast cells guided them back to a normal growth pattern

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T6XPH6&via=Digg&text=Squeezing Breasts 'Can Stop Cancer'

div.a: Is Ben Affleck Running For Senate?

div.div: There's an interesting rumor going around that Ben Affleck may run for John Kerry's soon to be vacant Senate seat.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VRU0Ek&via=Digg&text=Is Ben Affleck Running For Senate?

div.a: Fake 'Arrested Development' Shows Added To Netflix

div.div: The new season of "Arrested Development" doesn’t start until next year, but the people at Netflix are already having a bit of fun.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V7Aa6S&via=Digg&text=Fake 'Arrested Development' Shows Added To Netflix

div.a: Bird Removed From Chinese Zoo For Yelling Obscenities

div.div: Myna birds are prized for their ability to repeat human phrases. One of these amazing birds apparently fell in with the wrong crowd.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XLuAcO&via=Digg&text=Bird Removed From Chinese Zoo For Yelling Obscenities

div.a: Did Our Hands Evolve For Fighting?

div.div: Compared to the hands of other apes, our palms and fingers are shorter, and our thumbs are longer, stronger and more mobile. That makes for a stronger fist, and would have allowed “competing males to strike with greater force and power while greatly reducing the risk of injury to the hand,”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQqEFS&via=Digg&text=Did Our Hands Evolve For Fighting?

div.a: Astronomers Discover Potentially Habitable Earth-Like Planet Very Near Us

div.div: This is really exciting: an international team of astronomers has discovered that Tau Ceti, the closest single star like our Sun, has planets just like our solar system. But more importantly, one of these planets orbits in the habitable zone around the star.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T7r8us&via=Digg&text=Astronomers Discover Potentially Habitable Earth-Like Planet Very Near Us

div.div: A small company has announced a partnership with Autodesk to design a bioprinting platform.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12nXC7i&via=Digg&text=Building Body Parts With Software

div.a: Well Yeah Guy Fieri Frozen S'mores Pizza Exists

div.div: Guy Fieri, the distinguished chef and creator of donkey sauce, has a new frozen pizza available for purchase, though we are by no means recommending you actually pay money for this.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UM5edC&via=Digg&text=Well Yeah Guy Fieri Frozen S'mores Pizza Exists

div.a: Why Do The Vatican, African Rebels, And Kremlin Apparatchiks All Love Tupac?

div.div: What's interesting about Tupac in particular is that he seems to appeal to both the world's most powerful people and its most marginalized.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UFdigM&via=Digg&text=Why Do The Vatican, African Rebels, And Kremlin Apparatchiks All Love Tupac?

div.a: This Is Why I Own A Gun

div.div: The Daily Beast asked readers whether or not they own guns—and if so, why. More than a thousand people have weighed in so far. The results might surprise you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQgghI&via=Digg&text=This Is Why I Own A Gun

div.a: How An Illusionist Proposes To His Girlfriend

div.div: Sean Emory, an illusionist by trade, pulled off his most impressive and probably stressful trick yet: a magical proposal.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T7IplS&via=Digg&text=How An Illusionist Proposes To His Girlfriend

div.div: EAGLE SH*TTING ON YOUR CAR IS REAL, THOUGH

A design school in Montreal called Centre NAD (also known as the National Animation and Design Centre) posted on its website Wednesday that both eagle and baby were "were created in 3D animation and integrated in to the film afterwards."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12AcQVW&via=Digg&text=Eagle Grabbing Baby Was Fake

div.a: Will The World End Friday? U.S. Geological Survey Weighs In

div.div: In a release today billed as a “USGS Feature Story,” the hard-core scientists at the U.S. Geological Survey examine assertions coursing through the blogosphere that the world will end on Dec. 21 because the Mayan calendar says so.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/URrWSp&via=Digg&text=Will The World End Friday? U.S. Geological Survey Weighs In

div.a: Will Fast Food Turn Healthy Next Year?

div.div: A little-noticed Obamacare provision is spurring chains to develop healthier menus, and perhaps change eating habits.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TzFu5s&via=Digg&text=Will Fast Food Turn Healthy Next Year?
